Author: baswild
Text: it definitely depends on where you go for treatment. the place i went to, they couldn’t really “force” you to eat. if you didn’t finish the food you were supplemented and if you went 3 days (i think) without eating they would tube you in res. if you were in php they would send you to res and still wait 3 days before tubing. tbh, i found the program really beneficial. i think for a period i really was recovered but obviously life got in the way. going to treatment gave me a lot of insight about my own disorder and how to tackle it and what works for me in terms of help. i also made many friends and one of my roommates became one of my closest friends. it was a really good experience in my opinion but it definitely depends on the person.
